name: @liveblocks/core
description: Shared code and foundational internals for Liveblocks

scripts.showdeps: depcruise src --include-only '^src' --exclude='__tests__' --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg > /tmp/dependency-graph.svg && open /tmp/dependency-graph.svg
scripts.showdeps:high-level: depcruise src --include-only '^src' --exclude='(^src/index.ts|shallow.ts|__tests__)' --collapse='^src/(refs|lib|compat|types|crdts|protocol)' --config --output-type dot | dot -T svg > /tmp/dependency-graph.svg && open /tmp/dependency-graph.svg
